mapper.insert: insert into admin(username, password, email, phone) values(#{username},#{password},#{email},#{phone})
mapper.update: update admin set username = #{username}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, updatetime = #{updatetime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from admin order by id desc

select * from admin
username like concat('%', #{ username }, '%')
and phone like concat('%', #{ phone }, '%')
and email like concat('%', #{ email }, '%')
order by id desc
select * from admin where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
